dungeon.merchant: Hello adventurer. Before proceeding to the next floor, what do you think about taking a look at these items?

alert.message:
Your life is on the line. As your body falls weakly, a voice encourages you to continue. You don't know who you are, but you do notice a powerful presence at your side.

Do you want to get up and continue?

ads.fail: The reward could not be redeemed!
